SEARCH
Package org.udem.unishop.services

Class ProductService

java.lang.Object
org.udem.unishop.services.ProductService
public class ProductService extends Object
Service class for handling product-related operations.

      public ProductService(ProductRepository productRepository, UserService userService)
      Constructs a new ProductService with the provided ProductRepository and UserService.
      Parameters:
      productRepository - The repository for managing products.
      userService - The service for managing user-related operations.

    • getProductById

      public Product getProductById(UUID productId)
      Gets the product with the specified unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      productId - The unique identifier of the product.
      Returns:
      The product associated with the given identifier.

    • getProductsByType

      public ProductList getProductsByType(ProductType productType)
      Gets a list of products of a specific type.
      Parameters:
      productType - The type of product.
      Returns:
      A list of products matching the specified type.

    • createBook

      public boolean createBook(List<String> inputs, UUID userId)
      Creates a new book product based on the provided inputs and associates it with a seller.
      Parameters:
      inputs - The list of input values for creating the book.
      userId - The ID of the seller who is creating the book.
      Returns:
      true if the book creation is successful, false otherwise.

    • createComputerHardware

      Parameters:

      userId - The ID of the seller who is creating the computer hardware.
      Returns:
      true if the computer hardware creation is successful, false otherwise.

    • addLike

      public boolean addLike(UUID userId, UUID productId)
      Adds a like to a product by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user who is adding the like.
      productId - The ID of the product to which the like is being added.
      Returns:
      true if the like is successfully added, false otherwise.

    • removeProductLike

      public boolean removeProductLike(UUID userId, UUID productId)
      Removes a like from a product by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user who is removing the like.
      productId - The ID of the product to which the like is being removed.
      Returns:
      true if the like is successfully removed, false otherwise.

    • getProducts

      public ProductList getProducts()
      Gets a list of all available products in the product repository.
      Returns:
      A lsit of all available products.

    • addReview

      public boolean addReview(List<String> inputs, Buyer buyer, Product product)
      Adds a review to a product and associates it with the buyer.
      Parameters:
      inputs - The list of inputs containing the review details.
      buyer - The buyer who is adding the review.
      product - The product to which the review is being added.
      Returns:
      true if the review was successfully added, false otherwise.

    • removeInstance

      public void removeInstance(Product productById, UUID instance)
      Removes an instance from the specified product and updates the product in the repository.
      Parameters:
      productById - The product from which the instance should be removed.
      instance - The UUID of the instance to be removed.

    • updateProduct

      public void updateProduct(Product product)
      Updates the specified product in the repository.
      Parameters:
      product - The product to be updated.

    • changePoints

      public boolean changePoints(Product product, String input)
      Changes the bonus points for the specified product.
      Parameters:
      product - The product for which to change the bonus points.
      input - The new bonus points value as a string.
      Returns:
      true if the update is successful, false otherwise.

    • addPromotion

      public boolean addPromotion(Product product, List<String> inputs)
      Adds a promotion to the specified product, setting promotion points and price.
      Parameters:
      product - The product to which the promotion will be added.
      inputs - A list of strings containing promotion information.
      Returns:
      true if the update is successful, false otherwise.

    • addReviewLike

      public boolean addReviewLike(UUID user, UUID product, UUID review)
      Adds a like to the specified review of a product. If it's the first like for the review, awards bonus points to the author.
      Parameters:
      user - The ID of the user giving the like.
      product - The ID of the product to which the review belongs.
      review - The ID of the review to be liked.
      Returns:
      true if the update is successful, false otherwise.

    • removeReviewLike

      public boolean removeReviewLike(UUID user, UUID product, UUID review)
      Removes a like from the specified review of a product. If there is no more likes for the review, deducts bonus points from the author.
      Parameters:
      user - The ID of the user removing the like.
      product - The ID of the product to which the review belongs.
      review - The ID of the review to be unliked.
      Returns:
      true if the update is successful, false otherwise.
